Title: Pei Cao' Home Page
Body: Research Interests: Operating systems, high performance file systems, memory resource allocation; High performance I/O systems for parallel computers; Research Projects: Optimal Parallel Prefetching and Caching ACFS: Application Controlled File Caching and Prefetching Courses: CS739: Research Topics in Distributed Systems and Operating Systems (Fall 1996) CS736: Advanced Operating System (Spring 1996) Traces and Simulators: File Access Traces Recent Papers Integrated Parallel Prefetching and Caching Tracy Kimbrel, Pei Cao, Anna Karlin, Ed Felten, and Kai Li, Princeton CS Department Tech Report TR-502-95, November 1995.
